sentences.en: A scientific experiment is to test a hypothetical theory in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 科学实验就是将这个假设理论拿到实验室检验.

sentences.en: Correspondingly, any complete electrochemical cell can be separated into two hypothetical half - cells.
sentences.cn: 同样, 任一完整的化学电池也可分为两个假设的半电池.

sentences.en: Example 8 - 4 shows three hypothetical arrays that can store creature attributes.
sentences.cn: 例8-4假设有3个数组来存放人的属性.

sentences.en: Here's a hypothetical example of a research paper based on an experiment.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇基于一项实验的参考性学术论文范例.

sentences.en: It must be emphasized that these estimates are hypothetical.
sentences.cn: 必须强调说明,这些估算都是假定的.

sentences.en: Lets imagine a hypothetical case wITe we disagree.
sentences.cn: 让咱们假设唯一咱们不相同意的状况.

sentences.en: Neutrinos and the hypothetical gravitons, also massless particles, move at the same speed as light.
sentences.cn: 中微子和假想的引力子也是无质量粒子, 它们也以与光相同的速度运动.

sentences.en: Nibiru is hypothetical - that's a fancy word for " it doesn't exist "
sentences.cn: nibiru是有待证实的(这只是 “ 它不存在 ” 的冠冕堂皇的说法)

sentences.en: Such a model nonwoven may appear to be of limited and hypothetical interest.
sentences.cn: 看起来此种非纺织物模型只有有限的和假设性用途.

sentences.en: The brief note gave the orbital elements of the hypothetical planet.
sentences.cn: 那张纸上写了那颗假想行星的轨道参数.

sentences.en: The hypothetical electron smeart must exert a net attractive Hellmann - Feynman force to counterbalance the internuclear repulsion.
sentences.cn: 假设的电子弥散必须提供净赫尔曼吸引力以抵消核间排斥力.

sentences.en: The hypothetical scenario is, of course, unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 当然, 上述假想情况是不现实的.
这个问题完全基于假设。

sentences.en: This is a purely hypothetical situation.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是一种假设的情景.

sentences.en: To do that the hypothetical elements had to be isolated.
sentences.cn: 要做到这一点,就必须分离出这种假想的元素.
匀速运动只是一种假设性的运动,实际上并不存在.

trans.tran_cn: 假设的，假定的，有前提的，爱猜想的，假想
trans.tran_en: based on a situation that is not real, but that might happen
